content.question: The practical effect of this clause has been to

choices.label: make the legislature the most powerful branch of the national government
allow the national government to extend its powers beyond those enumerated in the Constitution
allow the state governments to nullify federal laws within their borders
give the President uncontested powers in the area of foreign policy
ensure that any powers not delegated by the Constitution to the United States government are reserved to the states and the people

content.answer: allow the national government to extend its powers beyond those enumerated in the Constitution

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the argument or perspective in the source may affect political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
